name: Where Wolf? (marylikesgames)
description:
Keep your fire alive and keep the wolves at bay. Beware, the nights get longer.

Made in 9 hours for Trijam 164: Day Night Cycle. (I failed the 3-hour challenge...)

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar to interact with objects (chop trees, light fire)
  • Use the mouse to aim, hold or click the LMB to attack

Credits:

  • Simple lighting tutorial from Gamemaker Casts
  • Character sprites from Enchanted Forest and Fantasy NPC by Superdark
  • Item sprites from forest_ and village_by analogStudios
  • Sounds from zapsplat.com
  • Font Silkscreen by Jason Kottke
